name: Trading Is Feudal
description:
Trading Is Feudal is a strategy game MMO where you trade with the capital cities in order to accumulate resources, and build buildings that also accumulate resources. The ultimate goal is to unlock all of the spells and abilities found in the area outside of the map, and control more regions in the world than any other player.

Play the game in the browser right now!

This game has a real persistent world that you can walk around and explore. You can see all the buildings that the other players have built, and you can even cast spells on their regions to try to mess them up.

I've added some really cool stuff recently. There are dynamically generated web pages that show the high scores for the players, as well as a live version of the world map.

High Scores

World Map

Almost all features are now complete. I am looking to add more buildings to the game, so any feedback you can provide would be very helpful. Thanks for taking a look!

Forums

The downloadable version requires Java to play.
